mapper.select:
/* select * from metoo_arp where id not in(select id from metoo_arp where v4ip like '192.168%') group by mac having count(*) <=1 order by v4ip asc*/
select * from metoo_arp group by mac having count(*) <=1 order by v4ip asc

SELECT metoo_ipv4_duplicates.id v4id, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.ip v4ip, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.mac, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.port, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.deviceIp, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.deviceName, metoo_ipv6_duplicates.id v6id, metoo_ipv6_duplicates.ip v6ip, metoo_mac_vendor.vendor macVendor FROM metoo_ipv4_duplicates JOIN metoo_ipv6_duplicates ON metoo_ipv4_duplicates.mac = metoo_ipv6_duplicates.mac AND metoo_ipv4_duplicates.port = metoo_ipv6_duplicates.port LEFT JOIN metoo_mac_vendor ON metoo_mac_vendor.mac = substring(metoo_ipv4_duplicates.mac, 1, 8);

SELECT #{addTime} as addTime, mac, port, v4ip, deviceIp, deviceName, macVendor, IF ( LENGTH(v6ip) - LENGTH(REPLACE(v6ip, ',', '')) >= 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX(v6ip, ',', 1), NULL ) v6ip,
IF ( LENGTH(v6ip) - LENGTH(REPLACE(v6ip, ',', '')) - 0 > 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX(v6ip, ',', 2), ',', - 1 ), NULL ) v6ip1,
IF ( LENGTH(v6ip) - LENGTH(REPLACE(v6ip, ',', '')) - 1 > 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX(v6ip, ',', 3), ',', - 1 ), NULL ) v6ip2,
IF ( LENGTH(v6ip) - LENGTH(REPLACE(v6ip, ',', '')) - 2 > 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX(v6ip, ',', 4), ',', - 1 ), NULL ) v6ip3 FROM ( SELECT v4id, mac, port, deviceIp, deviceName, v6id, macVendor, GROUP_CONCAT(v4ip) v4ip, GROUP_CONCAT(v6ip) v6ip FROM ( SELECT metoo_ipv4_duplicates.id v4id, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.ip v4ip, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.mac, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.port, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.deviceIp, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.deviceName, metoo_ipv6_duplicates.id v6id, metoo_ipv6_duplicates.ip v6ip, metoo_mac_vendor.vendor macVendor FROM metoo_ipv4_duplicates JOIN metoo_ipv6_duplicates ON metoo_ipv4_duplicates.mac = metoo_ipv6_duplicates.mac AND metoo_ipv4_duplicates.port = metoo_ipv6_duplicates.port LEFT JOIN metoo_mac_vendor ON metoo_mac_vendor.mac = substring( metoo_ipv4_duplicates.mac, 1, 8 ) ) arp GROUP BY v4id ) arp1

addTime,
v4ip,
v6ip,
mac,
port,
v4ip1,

INSERT INTO `metoo_arp_gather` ( addTime, v4ip, v6ip, mac, port, v4ip1, v4ip2, v4ip3, v6ip1, v6ip2, v6ip3, deviceIp, deviceName, tag, macVendor ) VALUES
( #{item.addTime}, #{item.v4ip}, #{item.v6ip}, #{item.mac}, #{item.port}, #{item.v4ip1}, #{item.v4ip2}, #{item.v4ip3}, #{item.v6ip1}, #{item.v6ip2}, #{item.v6ip3}, #{item.deviceIp}, #{item.deviceName}, #{item.tag}, #{item.macVendor} )

insert into metoo_arp_gather( addTime, mac, port, v4ip, deviceIp, deviceName, macVendor, v6ip, v6ip1, v6ip2, v6ip3 ) SELECT '2024-02-26 23:02:00' as addTime, mac, port, v4ip, deviceIp, deviceName, macVendor, IF ( LENGTH(v6ip) - LENGTH(REPLACE(v6ip, ',', '')) >= 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX(v6ip, ',', 1), NULL ) v6ip,
IF ( LENGTH(v6ip) - LENGTH(REPLACE(v6ip, ',', '')) - 0 > 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX(v6ip, ',', 2), ',', - 1 ), NULL ) v6ip1,
IF ( LENGTH(v6ip) - LENGTH(REPLACE(v6ip, ',', '')) - 1 > 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX(v6ip, ',', 3), ',', - 1 ), NULL ) v6ip2,
IF ( LENGTH(v6ip) - LENGTH(REPLACE(v6ip, ',', '')) - 2 > 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX(v6ip, ',', 4), ',', - 1 ), NULL ) v6ip3 FROM ( SELECT v4id, mac, port, deviceIp, deviceName, v6id, macVendor, GROUP_CONCAT(v4ip) v4ip, GROUP_CONCAT(v6ip) v6ip FROM ( SELECT metoo_ipv4_duplicates.id v4id, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.ip v4ip, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.mac, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.port, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.deviceIp, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.deviceName, metoo_ipv6_duplicates.id v6id, metoo_ipv6_duplicates.ip v6ip, metoo_mac_vendor.vendor macVendor FROM metoo_ipv4_duplicates JOIN metoo_ipv6_duplicates ON metoo_ipv4_duplicates.mac = metoo_ipv6_duplicates.mac AND metoo_ipv4_duplicates.port = metoo_ipv6_duplicates.port LEFT JOIN metoo_mac_vendor ON metoo_mac_vendor.mac = substring( metoo_ipv4_duplicates.mac, 1, 8 ) ) arp GROUP BY v4id ) arp1

INSERT INTO metoo_arp_gather ( addTime, mac, PORT, v4ip, deviceIp, deviceName, macVendor, v6ip, v6ip1, v6ip2, v6ip3 ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT #{addTime} AS addTime, arp.mac, arp. PORT, arp.v4ip, arp.deviceIp, arp.deviceName, metoo_mac_vendor.vendor macVendor, arp.v6ip, NULL AS v6ip1, NULL AS v6ip2, NULL AS v6ip3 FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT metoo_ipv4.mac, metoo_ipv4. PORT, metoo_ipv4.ip v4ip, metoo_ipv4.deviceIp, metoo_ipv4.deviceName, NULL AS v6ip FROM metoo_ipv4 WHERE metoo_ipv4.id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT metoo_ipv4.id FROM metoo_ipv4 JOIN metoo_ipv6 ON metoo_ipv4.mac = metoo_ipv6.mac AND metoo_ipv4. PORT = metoo_ipv6. PORT ) ) arp2 UNION SELECT mac, PORT, NULL AS v4ip, deviceIp, deviceName, ip ipv6 FROM ( SELECT * FROM metoo_ipv6 WHERE metoo_ipv6.id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT metoo_ipv6.id FROM metoo_ipv4 JOIN metoo_ipv6 ON metoo_ipv4.mac = metoo_ipv6.mac AND metoo_ipv4. PORT = metoo_ipv6. PORT ) ) arp1 ) arp LEFT JOIN metoo_mac_vendor ON metoo_mac_vendor.mac = substring(arp.mac, 1, 8) ) ip1 UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT #{addTime} AS addTime, mac, PORT, v4ip, deviceIp, deviceName, macVendor,
IF ( LENGTH(v6ip) - LENGTH(REPLACE(v6ip, ',', '')) >= 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX(v6ip, ',', 1), NULL ) v6ip,
IF ( LENGTH(v6ip) - LENGTH(REPLACE(v6ip, ',', '')) - 0 > 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX(v6ip, ',', 2), ',', - 1 ), NULL ) v6ip1,
IF ( LENGTH(v6ip) - LENGTH(REPLACE(v6ip, ',', '')) - 1 > 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX(v6ip, ',', 3), ',', - 1 ), NULL ) v6ip2,
IF ( LENGTH(v6ip) - LENGTH(REPLACE(v6ip, ',', '')) - 2 > 0, SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX(v6ip, ',', 4), ',', - 1 ), NULL ) v6ip3 FROM ( SELECT v4id, mac, PORT, deviceIp, deviceName, v6id, macVendor, GROUP_CONCAT(v4ip) v4ip, GROUP_CONCAT(v6ip) v6ip FROM ( SELECT metoo_ipv4_duplicates.id v4id, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.ip v4ip, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.mac, metoo_ipv4_duplicates. PORT, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.deviceIp, metoo_ipv4_duplicates.deviceName, metoo_ipv6_duplicates.id v6id, metoo_ipv6_duplicates.ip v6ip, metoo_mac_vendor.vendor macVendor FROM metoo_ipv4_duplicates JOIN metoo_ipv6_duplicates ON metoo_ipv4_duplicates.mac = metoo_ipv6_duplicates.mac AND metoo_ipv4_duplicates. PORT = metoo_ipv6_duplicates. PORT LEFT JOIN metoo_mac_vendor ON metoo_mac_vendor.mac = substring( metoo_ipv4_duplicates.mac, 1, 8 ) ) arp GROUP BY v4id ) arp1 ) ip2
mapper.update:
UPDATE metoo_arp
addTime = #{addTime},
v4ip = #{v4ip},
v6ip = #{v6ip},
mac = #{mac},
port = #{port},
v4ip1 = #{v4ip1},
v4ip2 = #{v4ip2},
v4ip3 = #{v4ip3},
v6ip1 = #{v6ip1},
v6ip2 = #{v6ip2},
v6ip3 = #{v6ip3},
deviceIp = #{deviceIp},
deviceName = #{deviceName},
deviceType = #{deviceType},
tag = #{tag},
macVendor = #{macVendor},
where id = #{v4ip3}

INSERT INTO metoo_arp_gather ( addTime, v4ip, mac, PORT, v6ip, deviceIp, deviceName, macVendor ) SELECT arp.*, metoo_mac_vendor.vendor macVendor FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT metoo_ipv4.addTime, metoo_ipv4.ip v4ip, metoo_ipv4.mac, metoo_ipv4. PORT, NULL AS v6ip, metoo_ipv4.deviceIp, metoo_ipv4.deviceName FROM metoo_ipv4 WHERE metoo_ipv4.id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT metoo_ipv4.id FROM metoo_ipv4 JOIN metoo_ipv6 ON metoo_ipv4.mac = metoo_ipv6.mac AND metoo_ipv4. PORT = metoo_ipv6. PORT ) ) arp2 UNION SELECT addTime, NULL AS ip, mac, PORT, ip ipv6, deviceIp, deviceName FROM ( SELECT * FROM metoo_ipv6 WHERE metoo_ipv6.id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT metoo_ipv6.id FROM metoo_ipv4 JOIN metoo_ipv6 ON metoo_ipv4.mac = metoo_ipv6.mac AND metoo_ipv4. PORT = metoo_ipv6. PORT ) ) arp1 ) arp LEFT JOIN metoo_mac_vendor ON metoo_mac_vendor.mac = substring(arp.mac, 1, 8);
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO metoo_arp SELECT * FROM metoo_arp_gather
INSERT INTO metoo_arp_history SELECT * FROM metoo_arp
